original_text: They take up all of them with the angle, they catch them in their net, and gather them in their drag: therefore they rejoice and are glad.
korean_text: 그가 낚시로 모두 낚으며 그물로 잡으며 투망으로 모으고 그리고는 기뻐하고 즐거워하여

sentences.original_text: They take up all of them with the angle
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모든 것을 낚싯대로 잡아 올리고

sentences.original_text: they catch them in their net
and gather them in their drag
